title: cEtah shrI bAlakrSNam
sahitya:
cEtah shrI bAlakrSNam bhaja rE rE cintitArttha prada caraNAravindam mukundam


anupallavi

  nUtana nIrada sadrsha sharIram nanda kishOram pIta vasana dharam kambu kandharam giridharam
(madhyamakAla)
pUtanAdi samhAram puruSOttamAvatAram shItaLa hrdaya vihAram shrI rukmiNI dAram 


caraNam    navanIta gandhavAha vadanam mrdu gadanam naLina patra nayanam vaTa patra shayanam
nava campaka nAsikam atasI suma bhAsakam natEndrAdi lOka pAlakam mrga mada tilakam
(madhyamakAla)
nava tulasI vanamAlam nAradAdi muni jAlam kuvalayAdi paripAlam guruguhanuta gOpAlam
